Interface Multi

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocMultiBuilder, MultiAdapter, MultiBuilder, MultiRenderer, PageTimeCounter, WMultiParser
public interface Multi
MULTI string state interface.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter, John Stanley - SRF Consulting, Gordon Parikh - SRF Consulting

  • Method Details

    • unsupportedTag

      void unsupportedTag(String tag)
      Handle an unsupported tag

    • addSpan

      void addSpan(String span)
      Add a span of text

    • setColorBackground

      void setColorBackground(Integer x)
      Set the (deprecated) message background color.
      Parameters:
      x - Background color (0-9; colorClassic value). Use the sign's default background color if x is null.

    • setPageBackground

      void setPageBackground(Integer x)
      Set the page background color for monochrome1bit, monochrome8bit, and colorClassic color schemes.
      Parameters:
      x - Background color (0-1 for monochrome1bit), (0-255 for monochrome8bit), (0-9 for colorClassic). Use the sign's default background color if x is null.

    • setPageBackground

      void setPageBackground(int r, int g, int b)
      Set the page background color for color24bit color scheme.
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0-255).
      g - Green component (0-255).
      b - Blue component (0-255).

    • setColorForeground

      void setColorForeground(Integer x)
      Set the foreground color for single-int color tag. [cfX]
      Parameters:
      x - Foreground color (0-1 for monochrome1bit), (0-255 for monochrome8bit), (0-9 for colorClassic & color24bit). Use the sign's default foreground color if x is null.

    • setColorForeground

      void setColorForeground(int r, int g, int b)
      Set the foreground color for color24bit color scheme.
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0-255).
      g - Green component (0-255).
      b - Blue component (0-255).

    • addColorRectangle

      void addColorRectangle(int x, int y, int w, int h, int z)
      Add a color rectangle for monochrome1bit, monochrome8bit, and colorClassic color schemes.
      Parameters:
      x - X pixel position of upper left corner.
      y - Y pixel position of upper left corner.
      w - Width in pixels.
      h - Height in pixels.
      z - Color of rectangle (0-1 for monochrome1bit), (0-255 for monochrome8bit), (0-9 for colorClassic).

    • addColorRectangle

      void addColorRectangle(int x, int y, int w, int h, int r, int g, int b)
      Add a color rectangle for color24bit color scheme.
      Parameters:
      x - X pixel position of upper left corner.
      y - Y pixel position of upper left corner.
      w - Width in pixels.
      h - Height in pixels.
      r - Red component (0-255).
      g - Green component (0-255).
      b - Blue component (0-255).

    • setFont

      void setFont(Integer f_num, String f_id)
      Set the font number.
      Parameters:
      f_num - Font number (1 to 255)
      f_id - Font version ID (4-digit hex string) Use the sign's default font if f_num is null.

    • addGraphic

      void addGraphic(int g_num, Integer x, Integer y, String g_id)
      Add a graphic

    • setJustificationLine

      void setJustificationLine(Multi.JustificationLine jl)
      Set the line justification. Use the sign's default line justification if jl is null.

    • setJustificationPage

      void setJustificationPage(Multi.JustificationPage jp)
      Set the page justification. Use the sign's default page justification if jp is null.

    • addLine

      void addLine(Integer spacing)
      Add a new line.
      Parameters:
      spacing - Pixel spacing (null means use font spacing)

    • addPage

      void addPage()
      Add a page

    • setPageTimes

      void setPageTimes(Integer pt_on, Integer pt_off)
      Set the page times.
      Parameters:
      pt_on - Page on time (deciseconds; null means default)
      pt_off - Page off time (deciseconds; null means default)

    • setCharSpacing

      void setCharSpacing(Integer sc)
      Set the character spacing.
      Parameters:
      sc - Character spacing (null means use font spacing)

    • setTextRectangle

      void setTextRectangle(int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Set the text rectangle

    • addClearGuideAdvisory

      void addClearGuideAdvisory(String dms, int rid, int tsp, String mode, int ridx)
      Add a ClearGuide advisory.
      Parameters:
      dms - DMS name
      rid - CG route id
      tsp - Threshold speed
      mode - Variable to use: e.g. tt, delay
      ridx - Route index, zero based

    • addExitWarning

      void addExitWarning(String did, int occ)
      Add an exit backup warning.
      Parameters:
      did - Exit detector ID.
      occ - Occupancy threshold to activate warning.

    • addFeed

      void addFeed(String fid)
      Add a feed message

    • addParking

      void addParking(String pid, String l_txt, String c_txt)
      Add parking area availability.
      Parameters:
      pid - Parking area ID.
      l_txt - Text for low availability.
      c_txt - Text for closed area.

    • addRwis

      void addRwis(String condition, int level)
      Add RWIS condition warning.
      Parameters:
      condition - Weather condition.
      level - Warning level.

    • addSlowWarning

      void addSlowWarning(int spd, int dist, String mode)
      Add a slow traffic warning.
      Parameters:
      spd - Highest speed to activate warning.
      dist - Distance to search for slow traffic (1/10 mile).
      mode - Tag replacement mode (none, dist or speed).

    • addStandby

      void addStandby()
      Add a standby-message tag

    • addTimeAction

      void addTimeAction(String dir, String format)
      Add a time action substitution field.
      Parameters:
      dir - Chronoligical direction ("n" or "p").
      format - Format pattern (DateTimeFormattter).

    • addTravelTime

      void addTravelTime(String sid, Multi.OverLimitMode mode, String o_txt)
      Add a travel time destination.
      Parameters:
      sid - Destination station ID.
      mode - Over limit mode.
      o_txt - Over limit text.

    • addTolling

      void addTolling(String mode, String[] zones)
      Add a tolling message

    • addSpeedAdvisory

      void addSpeedAdvisory()
      Add a speed advisory

    • addLocator

      void addLocator(String code)
      Add an incident locator
